mapper.sql: SELECT NOTICE_NO, WRITER_NO, NOTICE_TIT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_COUNT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, DATE_WRITEN, DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY, NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE ORDER BY DECODE(NOTICE_STATUS, 'Y', 1), NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_M_NO, REPORTED_M_NO, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_STATUS, REPORT_CATEGORY
SELECT NO, ID, PASSWORD, MEMBER_TYPE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PLATFORM_TYPE, STATUS, IMG_NAME, MODIFY_IMG_NAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE
SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_DATE, PRO_MODIFY_DATE, PRO_VOL, PRO_IMG, PRO_MODIFY_IMG, PRO_INFO, PRO_STAT, PRO_CAT, PRO_STOCK, PRO_SOLD, PRO_MFG, PRO_RATING
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M1 ON(R.REPORTED_M_NO = M1.NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.REPORT_M_NO = M2.NO)
AND REPORT_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND M2.NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND M1.NAME LIKE '%' || #{name2} || '%'

SELECT R.REPORT_NO, R.REPORT_M_NO, R.REPORTED_M_NO, R.REPORT_DATE, R.REPORT_TITLE, R.REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_STATUS, R.REPORT_CATEGORY, M1.NAME AS REPORTED_M_NAME, M2.NAME AS REPORT_M_NAME FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M1 ON(R.REPORTED_M_NO = M1.NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.REPORT_M_NO = M2.NO) WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'
AND REPORT_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND M2.NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND M1.NAME LIKE '%' || #{name2} || '%'
ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPORT_NO = #{no}
UPDATE CHAL_TODAY SET CHAL_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CHAL_NO = #{no}
UPDATE CHAL_MONTH SET CHAL_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CHAL_NO = #{no}
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NO = (SELECT REPORTED_M_NO FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = #{ no })
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
ID LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%'
NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE
NOTICE_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
NOTICE_TIT LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
WRITER_NO LIKE '%' || #{writerNo} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA
QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
AND Q.QNA_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND Q.QNA_TIT LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND QC.C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
ORDER BY DATE_WRITEN DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA
QNA_STATUS = 'N'
AND Q.QNA_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND Q.QNA_TIT LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND QC.C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
ORDER BY DATE_WRITEN DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO, WRITER_NO, NOTICE_TIT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_COUNT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, DATE_WRITEN, DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY, NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{ no }
mapper.update:
UPDATE NOTICE
NOTICE_TIT = #{title},
NOTICE_CONTENT = #{content},
ORIGINAL_FILENAME = #{originalFileName},
RENAMED_FILENAME = #{renamedFileName},
DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY=SYSDATE
WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{no}
mapper.select:
SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.WRITER_NO, Q.QNA_TIT, Q.QNA_CAT, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_COUNT, Q.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, Q.RENAMED_FILENAME, Q.DATE_WRITEN, Q.DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY, Q.QNA_STATUS, QC.C_NAME FROM QNA Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY QC ON(QNA_CAT = QC.C_NO)
Q.QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
AND Q.QNA_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND Q.QNA_TIT LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND QC.C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.WRITER_NO, Q.QNA_TIT, Q.QNA_CAT, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_COUNT, Q.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, Q.RENAMED_FILENAME, Q.DATE_WRITEN, Q.DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY, Q.QNA_STATUS, QC.C_NAME, QA.ANSWER_CONTENT, QA.ANSWER_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY QC ON(Q.QNA_CAT = QC.C_NO) JOIN QNA_ANSWER QA ON(QA.QNA_NO = Q.QNA_NO)
Q.QNA_STATUS = 'N'
AND Q.QNA_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND Q.QNA_TIT LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND QC.C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC
SELECT QA.ANSWER_CONTENT FROM QNA_ANSWER QA JOIN QNA Q ON(QA.QNA_NO = Q.QNA_NO) ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_ANSWER( ANSWER_NO, QNA_NO, WRITER_NO, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_STATUS, ANSWER_DATE ) VALUES( SEQ_QNA_ANSWER.NEXTVAL, #{qnaNo}, #{writerNo}, #{answerContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_ANSWER SET ANSWER_CONTENT = #{answerContent}, ANSWER_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ANSWER_NO = #{answerNo}
mapper.select:
FROM MEMBER
NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
ID LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%'
NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
ORDER BY DECODE(STATUS, 'Y', 1), NO DESC

SELECT CHAL_NO, CATEGORY, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHAL_STATUS FROM CHAL_TODAY
CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
CHAL_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
CHAL_POINT LIKE '%' || #{point} || '%'
ORDER BY CHAL_NO DESC

SELECT CHAL_NO, CATEGORY, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_COUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHAL_STATUS FROM CHAL_MONTH
CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
CHAL_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
CHAL_POINT LIKE '%' || #{point} || '%'
ORDER BY CHAL_NO DESC

SELECT NO, MEM_NO, CHAL_NO, CHAL_STATUS, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_POINT_STATUS, CHAL_DATE FROM CHAL_MONTH_MEM
CHAL_POINT_STATUS = 'N'
AND NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #{memberNo} || '%'
AND CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{chalNo} || '%'
ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT NO, MEM_NO, CHAL_NO, CHAL_STATUS, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_POINT_STATUS, CHAL_DATE FROM CHAL_TODAY_MEM
CHAL_POINT_STATUS = 'N'
AND NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #{memberNo} || '%'
AND CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{chalNo} || '%'
ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
PRO_NO LIKE '%' || #{proNo} || '%'
PRO_NAME LIKE '%' || #{proName} || '%'
PRO_STOCK LIKE '%' || #{proStock} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_INQUIRY
INQ_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
PRO_NO LIKE '%' || #{proNo} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_TODAY
CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
CHAL_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
CHAL_POINT LIKE '%' || #{point} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_MONTH
CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
CHAL_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
CHAL_POINT LIKE '%' || #{point} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_MONTH_MEM
CHAL_POINT_STATUS = 'N'
AND NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #{memberNo} || '%'
AND CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{chalNo} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_MONTH_MEM
CHAL_POINT_STATUS = 'N'
AND NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #{memberNo} || '%'
AND CHAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{chalNo} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT NO, MEMBER_TYPE, NAME, (SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM REPORT WHERE (REPORTED_M_NO)=NO) AS REPORTED FROM MEMBER WHERE NO IN(SELECT REPORTED_M_NO FROM REPORT) AND STATUS = 'Y')

FROM PRODUCT
PRO_NO LIKE '%' || #{proNo} || '%'
PRO_NAME LIKE '%' || #{proName} || '%'
PRO_STOCK LIKE '%' || #{proStock} || '%'
ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC
ORDER BY PRO_STOCK

SELECT PRO_NO, MEMBER_NO, INQ_NO, INQ_DATE, INQ_MOD_DATE, INQ_TITLE, INQ_CONTENT, INQ_STAT, INQ_SECRET FROM PRODUCT_INQUIRY
INQ_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
PRO_NO LIKE '%' || #{proNo} || '%'
ORDER BY DECODE(INQ_STAT, 'N', 1), INQ_NO DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE PRODUCT
PRO_NAME = #{proName},
PRO_PRICE = #{proPrice},
PRO_VOL = #{proVol},
PRO_MODIFY_IMG = #{proModifyImg},
PRO_INFO = #{proInfo},
PRO_STAT = #{proStat},
PRO_CAT = #{proCat},
PRO_STOCK = #{proStock},
PRO_SOLD = #{proSold},
PRO_MFG = #{proMfg},
PRO_MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE
WHERE PRO_NO = #{proNo}

UPDATE CHAL_TODAY
CATEGORY = #{category},
CHAL_TITLE = #{chalTitle},
CHAL_CONTENT = #{chalContent},
ORIGINAL_FILENAME = #{originalFilename},
RENAMED_FILENAME = #{renamedFilename},
CHAL_POINT = #{chalPoint},
START_DATE = #{startDate},
END_DATE = #{endDate},
CHAL_STATUS = 'Y',
WHERE CHAL_NO = #{chalNo}

UPDATE CHAL_MONTH
CATEGORY = #{category},
CHAL_TITLE = #{chalTitle},
CHAL_CONTENT = #{chalContent},
ORIGINAL_FILENAME = #{originalFilename},
RENAMED_FILENAME = #{renamedFilename},
CHAL_POINT = #{chalPoint},
CHAL_COUNT = #{chalCount},
START_DATE = #{startDate},
END_DATE = #{endDate},
CHAL_STATUS = DEFAULT,
WHERE CHAL_NO = #{chalNo}
UPDATE CHAL_MONTH_MEM SET CHAL_POINT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE CHAL_TODAY_MEM SET CHAL_POINT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE ORDER_SUM SET ORDER_STAT = '배송완료' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
UPDATE ORDER_SUM SET ORDER_STAT = '결제완료' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
UPDATE ORDER_SUM SET ORDER_STAT = '주문취소' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT NO, MEMBER_TYPE, NAME, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM REPORT WHERE (REPORTED_M_NO)=NO) AS REPORTED FROM MEMBER WHERE NO IN(SELECT REPORTED_M_NO FROM REPORT)
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
ORDER BY REPORTED DESC

SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_STAT, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_METHOD, ORDER_POINT FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '결제완료'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'

SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_STAT, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_METHOD, ORDER_POINT FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '배송완료'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'

SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_STAT, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_METHOD, ORDER_POINT FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '주문취소'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, DETAIL_PRO_NO, DETAIL_PRO_NAME, DETAIL_OPT, DETAIL_OPT_NAME, DETAIL_QTY, DETAIL_PRICE FROM ORDER_DETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ no }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '결제완료'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '결제완료'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '배송완료'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_SUM
ORDER_STAT = '주문취소'
AND ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #{no} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = #{ no }
FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO = #{ proNo }
SELECT CHAL_NO, CATEGORY, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM CHAL_TODAY WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo }
SELECT CHAL_NO, CATEGORY, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_COUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE FROM CHAL_MONTH WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo }
SELECT QNA_NO, WRITER_NO, QNA_TIT, QNA_CAT, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_COUNT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, DATE_WRITEN, DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY, QNA_STATUS FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{ no }
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QNA_STATUS = 'N' WHERE QNA_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_INFO, PRO_VOL, PRO_MODIFY_DATE, PRO_SOLD, PRO_MFG, PRO_IMG, PRO_STAT, PRO_CAT, PRO_DATE, PRO_STOCK, PRO_MODIFY_IMG ) VALUES( SEQ_PRONO.NEXTVAL, #{proName}, #{proPrice}, #{proInfo}, #{proVol}, DEFAULT, 0, #{proMfg}, #{proImg}, #{proStat}, #{proCat}, DEFAULT, #{proStock}, #{proModifyImg} )

INSERT INTO CHAL_TODAY( CHAL_NO, CATEGORY, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHAL_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_CHAL_TODAY.NEXTVAL, 1, #{chalTitle}, #{chalContent}, #{originalFilename}, #{renamedFilename}, #{chalPoint}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO NOTICE( NOTICE_NO, WRITER_NO, NOTICE_TIT, NOTICE_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, DATE_WRITEN, DATE_WRITEN_MODIFY, NOTICE_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writerNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO CHAL_MONTH( CHAL_NO, CATEGORY, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_COUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHAL_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_CHAL_MONTH.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{chalTitle}, #{chalContent}, #{originalFilename}, #{renamedFilename}, #{chalPoint}, #{chalCount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLICATION

SELECT A.APP_NO AS A_APP_NO, A.MEMBER_NO AS A_MEMBER_NO, A.APP_NAME AS A_APP_NAME, A.APP_URL AS A_APP_URL, A.APP_TITLE AS A_APP_TITLE, A.APP_CONTENT AS A_APP_CONTENT, A.APP_S_NO AS A_APP_S_NO, A.APP_C_NO AS A_APP_C_NO, A.APP_DATE AS A_APP_DATE, P.C_NAME AS P_C_NAME FROM APPLICATION A JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY P ON(A.APP_C_NO = P.C_NO)
AND APP_S_NO = 1
AND APP_S_NO = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_BIDDING ( BID_NO, BID_NAME, BID_COND, BID_CURR, BID_S_NO, BID_URL, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_BIDNO.NEXTVAL, #{bidName}, #{bidCond}, #{bidCurr}, #{bidStatNo}, #{bidUrl}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName} )
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO, MEMBER_NO, INQ_NO, INQ_DATE, INQ_MOD_DATE, INQ_TITLE, INQ_CONTENT, INQ_STAT FROM PRODUCT_INQUIRY WHERE INQ_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRO_INQ_ANSWER ( PRO_NO, MEMBER_NO, INQ_NO, INQ_ANS, INQ_ANS_DATE ) VALUES ( #{proNo}, #{memberNo}, #{inqNo}, #{inqAns}, DEFAULT )
